content.rendered:
Cosmetic Injector

Dr. Chelvi Pandian completed her medical degree at the renowned Madras University in Tamil Nadu, India. After immigrating to Canada, she completed her post-graduate training in Family Medicine at Laval University in Québec City.

Dr. Pandian has a dual passion for the beauty industry and bringing happiness to everyone around her. In 1996, she brought both passions together by pursuing extensive training in cosmetic medicine from renowned experts from Canada, the U.S., Argentina, Costa Rica, Mexico, and others. She is widely recognized as among the most experienced professionals in Canada for neuromodulators, dermal fillers, thread lifts, and body contouring.

In pursuit of offering the best results for her clients, Dr. Pandian dedicates herself to reviewing the latest research in the field and continually updating her skills.

Dr. Pandian treats each client with great care and sincerely values their trust. She looks forward to seeing how she can help you!

For appointments please call 613-562-2121, write to us at info@yorkstreetspa.com or visit our website www.yorkstreetspa.com to book online.
